about_the_game:
TRAVERSE THE BLIGHT FILLED WORLD...
Hyper Light Drifter meets Chrono Trigger and Trials of Mana! Embark on an epic adventure as Lucian, a young knight determined to save his older brother Lance from the corruption that has overtaken him. Traverse through different cities and towns of the kingdom, encountering various manifestations of corruption along the way. Utilize Lucian's combat skills and the power of the sacred stones to purify the corrupted creatures and overcome the challenges that await. Will you be able to save Lance from the corruption that has consumed him? The fate of the kingdom rests in your hands in this emotional and action-packed RPG.

DISCOVER MANY SECRETS...
Traverse a vast and immersive world filled with hidden treasures and ancient secrets waiting to be uncovered. With each step, you'll encounter unique landscapes, mysterious ruins, and dangerous creatures. But the thrill of discovery is worth the risk. Unearth forgotten lore and unravel the secrets of the world as you journey through it. But beware, as the blight continues to spread, there are those who would do anything to keep their secrets hidden. Will you be brave enough to uncover the truth?

UNLEASH POWERFUL ABILITIES!
With each battle, you'll have the freedom to choose which abilities to use, allowing for a customizable combat experience. Whether you prefer a more aggressive playstyle or a defensive one, the choice is yours. Master Lucian's skills, including swordsmanship, archery, and magic, to overcome any challenge that comes your way. With the ability to create your unique playstyle, you'll feel empowered to take on the blight and save your brother.
